question: Who has become the youngest scorer in champions league history?
explanation: Barcelona forward Ansu Fati became the youngest scorer in the history of the UEFA Champions League after he netted a late winner in his side\'s 2-1 victory over Inter Milan .At just 17 years and 40 days old, Fati overtook Peter Ofori-Quaye as the competition\'s youngest marksman after coming on as an 85th-minute substitute.
